title: The Unsexpected Story
description: In The Unsexpected Story, author Darren Roberts, former CEO and co-founder of the AVN Media Network (AVN), speaks candidly with the key professionals behind one of the world’s largest and most profitable trades, the adult entertainment industry. The Unsexpected Story delivers unique insight into the minds of the industry executives, stars, marketers, and technology mavens who are responsible for the creation and management of the most successful and enduring brands in adult entertainment. As unique as the products they make, their influence remains instrumental to the growth, profitability, and sustainability of one of the most provoking and controversial businesses in the modern world.Engaging, conversational, and smart, The Unsexpected Story goes where other industry tell-alls don’t, tracing the economic and technological lifespan of the vast adult entertainment industry through the personal experiences of the individuals who have made a lasting impression on this forever green, multi-billion dollar empire.
author: Darren  Roberts
